attributes.action: urge for a statue to be built in honour of Charlotte McKenna, winner of FHM's High Street Honey's Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 31st January 2006, Chichester girl Charlotte McKenna was announced as FHM Magazine's High Street Honey.  Chichester, in West Sussex, isn't really famous for all that much so Lloydie from Power FM has had the idea of putting up a statue in her honour.  Joined by his co-host Katie, they are trying to get Chichester District Council to get a statue of Charlotte put up.  We urge the Prime Minister to use his influence to help achieve this aim.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
